backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature-to-file mappings and evidence metadata for PWA install button and client-side install logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptions of several frontend components and a PWA install hook.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing navigation across sections and rendering AppShell with Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/kyl/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation, sidebar, and footer, including the PWA install button.
frontend/src/components/kyl/ContentBlock: Card-based wrapper component for titled content sections.
frontend/src/components/kyl/InstallAppBu: Button that triggers PWA installation or shows fallback instructions when unsupported.
frontend/src/components/kyl/KeyFeaturesC: Displays a legislative act title with a list of key features styled in a card.
frontend/src/components/kyl/nav.ts: Defines navigation section metadata used by the AppShell.
frontend/src/components/kyl/ScenarioCard: Renders a mediation scenario card with description and step‑by‑step resolution list.
Overview page with hero image, intro text, and navigation cards to main sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication with AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, clear, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Implements a hook to manage PWA installation prompts, standalone detection, and tracking install outcomes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with typography and layout styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/sections/AboutMediationSect: Renders an accordion-based section explaining mediation, its benefits, and suitable dispute types.
frontend/src/sections/LegislativeKnowled: Displays tabbed summaries of key features from mediation, civil procedure, and arbitration legal frameworks.
frontend/src/sections/ScenariosSection.t: Presents mediation scenarios with detailed dispute descriptions and step‑by‑step resolution outlines in an accordion layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the KYL legal awareness app, including versioning, architecture notes, features, and requirements.
